content.prompt: Which of the following processes is most consistent with the differences in the amino acid sequences listed in Table 1 ?

choices.label: Each host transcribes and translates this gene differently.
S. aureus develops a mutualistic relationship with each host species.
Changes in amino acid sequence are unrelated to protein function.
Each strain is best adapted to a specific host species.

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
